title: Nijigaku: Towards the Shuffle Festival! Part 8
detail_text: <:th_ch0207/>Emma-san, may I interview you right now?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Of course~. By the way, Kanata-chan has been working increasingly harder after your interview, did something happen, Setsuna-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Ehehe, "I want you to blast off together with me!" or so I told her....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Waaah, that sounds nice. Let me join too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Of course! Let's blast off together, Emma-san! With that said, can you tell us how you feel about the upcoming Shuffle Festival!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Yes! This time, the songs we're singing have been chosen by the people who have always supported us, right? I was happy that people want to hear me sing this song. Because I also love this song.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Yeah, I was excited about how the results will turn out during the whole voting period.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>That's right. Because it's a song that everyone chose for me, I want to sing it while respecting the feelings contained in it. But the more I practiced, the more that started to change a little.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>What do you mean by that?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>You see, as I was practicing, I came to love the song more than ever before. That's why I also want to sing it with great care so that I can convey my love for it too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
